elements.name: x-slot
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `name`.

elements.name: x-form
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `action`, `method`, `enctype`.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: The action URL for the form.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: The HTTP method for the form. Defaults to 'POST'.

attributes.name: enctype
attributes.description: The encoding type for the form.

elements.name: x-submit
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `label`.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the submit button. Defaults to 'Submit'.

elements.name: x-input
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `name`, `label`, `type`, `default`.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the input field.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the input field.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the input field.

attributes.name: default
attributes.description: The default value for the input field.

elements.name: x-icon
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `name`, `class`.

elements.name: x-vite-tags
elements.description: A default Tempest component. Possible attributes: `entrypoint`, `entrypoints`.

attributes.name: :if
attributes.description: Tempest conditional attribute - renders element if condition is true

attributes.name: :elseif
attributes.description: Tempest conditional attribute - renders element if previous conditions are false and this condition is true

attributes.name: :else
attributes.description: Tempest conditional attribute - renders element if all previous conditions are false

attributes.name: :foreach
attributes.description: Tempest loop attribute - iterates over a collection

attributes.name: :forelse
attributes.description: Tempest loop fallback attribute - renders element if foreach collection is empty
